remarks: Closure of the vector to functional map.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hvmap1o.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmap1o.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmap1o.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmap1o.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
hvmap1o.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
hvmap1o.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
hvmap1o.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` D ) $.
hvmap1o.c $e |- C = { f e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
hvmap1o.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmap1o.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmapcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hvmapclN $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` X ) e. ( C \ { Q } ) ) $.
$d F f $.
$d L f $.
$d O f $.
$d U f $.
$d V f $.
